ancestors.content:
#Trump…would have multiple aves to block, rewrite or slow large parts of #Biden’s $1.6T in #climate, #energy & #infrastructure initiatives, [per] #Republicans & govt spending experts…in some cases,limited only by how aggressively he #attacks. The results could be 1 of the most lasting #consequences of the #election, w/implications for everything from hundreds of planned #ElectricCar, #battery & #RenewableEnergy factories to slowing #Earth’s #warming.
#Harris2024
https://www.politico.com/news/2024/07/29/biden-climate-spending-trump-2024-00171593

ancestors.content:
#Trump has been vague about which parts of #Biden’s programs he would seek to throttle or alter—but not about his #hostility to the #climate agenda.

“All of the trillions…that are…not yet spent, we will redirect…for…projects like roads, bridges, dams & we will not allow it to be spent on meaningless Green New Scam ideas,” Trump said during his speech at the #RNC, vastly *overstating* [lying about] the amt of money Biden’s agencies have yet to disburse.

#ClimateChange #Fight4AFuture #Harris2024

ancestors.content:
The new #GOP platform similarly calls for “terminating the Socialist Green New Deal” & ending what it describes as Biden’s “ELECTRIC VEHICLE MANDATE.” [their all-caps]

A limited number of forces might be in place to deter #Trump.

#Republican governors & lawmakers whose states are in line to benefit from #Biden’s programs could object to repealing them.

#Climate #ClimateCrisis #ClimateChange #Fight4AFuture #VoteBlue #Harris2024

ancestors.content:

#Climate #ClimateCrisis #ClimateChange #Project2025 #Fight4AFuture #VoteBlue #Harris2024

descendants.content:
Heightening the risk for #Biden’s agenda is the fact that only a small % of his $1.1T in congressionally appropriated #energy, #climate, #technology & #infrastructure investments has been spent to date; <17% as of this Apr….Reasons for that lag include the pace of doling out #grants, completing the #regulations guiding energy #tax breaks & other big steps required of Biden’s agencies, some of which ended up w/huge sums of cash for projects they’d never overseen before.
#ClimateCrisis #Harris2024

descendants.content:

#Climate #ClimateCrisis #ClimateChange #Project2025 #Fight4AFuture #VoteBlue #Harris2024

descendants.content: @Nonilex Trump would simply withhold the money via Impoundment, which is illegal. However, faithfully executing the laws is one of the central functions of the executive, and the executive cannot even be asked about possible criminal activity related to core functions (even more so than "official acts"). So, his interpretation of "faithfully execute" takes absolute precedent, and he's free to ignore any spending designated by Congress.
@Nonilex I just don't get this. Cancelling student debt is illegal, but overturning an election isn't.
@Nonilex So... Basically congress would end up having zero power, and end up being a Hollywood old western facade. I really don't think most people understand this.
